mainHeading.title: Confirm you want to remove this goal

notes.label: Why do you want to remove this goal?
notes.error: Enter why you want to remove this goal

goal-removal-note.isNotEmpty: Enter why you want to remove this goal
goal-removal-note.maxLength: The reason for removing this goal must be 4,000 characters or less

en.pageBodyOne: Remove a goal if it is no longer relevant to {{ subject.givenName }}.
en.pageBodyTwo: You will still be able to see it in 'Removed goals', but {{ subject.givenName }} will not be expected to achieve it.
